unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Fair Two-Dice Game
question_text:
You play a game in which you win $\$10$ if a sum of $7\text{ results}$ from rolling two balanced dice. You win $\$5$ if you roll doubles. Otherwise, you win nothing.
In order for the game to be fair, how much should you be charged to play the game?
